Articles.Content: I personally am a Qbasic enthusiast and i would like to see what you guys have made?

Oh, memories. QuickBasic is fun but so old, I doubt I have any of what I did in the past around anymore ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

Honestly, the language is really needed as a good "How to really program" despite the spaghetti programming that it often creates. There's much more to be said when you write your own simple 2D engine and learn all the problems that it creates, how to fix them, how to improve framerate... than when you just download a library and plug+chug until something works. (Then again, I didn't really do anything WITH what I made, I was often more interested in the backend than the actual games.)
